subject: Basketball
NBA Championship
lead_paragraph: With the Cavaliers and the Warriors both missing the net in the extra period, Game 2 of the N.B.A. finals came down to foul calls, no-calls and free throws.
snippet: With the Cavaliers and the Warriors both missing the net in the extra period, Game 2 of the N.B.A. finals came down to foul calls, no-calls and free throws.
